Name: Physics: Optics Table
About the game: This Physics learning lab experience allows teachers and students to perform experiments with the phenomenon of refraction and reflection of light, also called Snellâ€™s Law. Some of the key activities offered by this VR Physics learning experience are: Experiments performed on an optics table Selection of different sets of glasses and lenses for light refraction and reflection Selection of one and three laser beams Ability to rotate glasses/lenses and lasers in 15-degree angles
